member.name: MULTI_QI
member.summary: Represents an interface in a query for multiple interfaces.

member.name: MULTI_QI.pIID
member.summary: A pointer to an interface identifier.

member.name: MULTI_QI.pItf
member.summary: A pointer to the interface requested in pIID. This member must be NULL on input.

member.name: MULTI_QI.hr
member.summary: The return value of the call to locate the requested interface. Common return values include S_OK and E_NOINTERFACE. This member must be 0 on input.
